Message:
Once again, because of me,
no flowers were sold...
Granny always gave me a warm hug.

“There’s no need to cry.
Nothing is your fault...”

I’ve been told all my life that
witches are to blame for all the
calamities and evils in this world...

The only person who’d
never call me evil...

“Your magic power is just
what makes you special.

God gave you this gift
so that you can be you.

That’s why, there’s nothing
to be ashamed of...
Be proud of who you are!”

“I was too late to see
just how special you are.

So, at the very least,
you need to get your head
on straight, and live!”

Granny looked kind of downhearted,
but did her best to smile for me.
